items.name: Copper Ingot
items.description: A copper ingot is a metal ingot obtained by smelting raw copper or copper ore.

howToObtain.description: Smelt raw copper in a furnace or blast furnace

items.name: Iron Ingot
items.description: Iron ingots are versatile metal ingots used extensively in crafting.

howToObtain.description: Smelt raw iron or iron ore in a furnace

items.name: Gold Ingot
items.description: Gold ingots are used to craft various golden items and powered rails.

howToObtain.description: Smelt raw gold or gold ore in a furnace

items.name: Diamond
items.description: Diamonds are rare gems used to craft powerful tools and armor.

howToObtain.description: Mine diamond ore with an iron pickaxe or better

items.name: Emerald
items.description: Emeralds are rare gems primarily used for trading with villagers.

howToObtain.description: Mine emerald ore with an iron pickaxe or better
Trade with villagers

items.name: Coal
items.description: Coal is a common fuel source and crafting ingredient.

howToObtain.description: Mine coal ore with any pickaxe

items.name: Redstone Dust
items.description: Redstone dust is used for creating redstone circuits and mechanisms.

howToObtain.description: Mine redstone ore with an iron pickaxe or better

items.name: Lapis Lazuli
items.description: Lapis lazuli is a blue dye and enchanting ingredient.

howToObtain.description: Mine lapis ore with a stone pickaxe or better

items.name: Netherite Ingot
items.description: Netherite ingots are the most durable material for tools and armor.

howToObtain.description: Combine 4 netherite scraps with 4 gold ingots

items.name: Stick
items.description: Sticks are basic crafting components for tools and torches.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 2 wooden planks vertically

items.name: Torch
items.description: Torches provide light and prevent mob spawning.

howToObtain.description: Combine 1 coal/charcoal with 1 stick

items.name: Crafting Table
items.description: A crafting table provides a 3×3 crafting grid for advanced recipes.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 4 wooden planks in a 2×2 grid

items.name: Furnace
items.description: A furnace is used for smelting ores and cooking food.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 8 cobblestone in a ring shape

items.name: Chest
items.description: Chests are storage blocks that can hold items.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 8 wooden planks in a ring shape

items.name: Wooden Pickaxe
items.description: A basic pickaxe for mining stone and coal ore.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 3 planks and 2 sticks

items.name: Stone Pickaxe
items.description: A stone pickaxe for mining iron ore and other resources.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 3 cobblestone and 2 sticks

items.name: Iron Pickaxe
items.description: An iron pickaxe for mining diamond, gold, and redstone ores.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 3 iron ingots and 2 sticks

items.name: Diamond Pickaxe
items.description: A powerful pickaxe capable of mining obsidian and ancient debris.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 3 diamonds and 2 sticks

items.name: Bread
items.description: Bread is a food item that restores hunger points.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 3 wheat

items.name: Oak Planks
items.description: Oak planks are basic building blocks crafted from oak logs.

howToObtain.description: Craft from 1 oak log (yields 4 planks)
